text: Richard John Vitale (; born June 9, 1939), also known as "Dickie V", is an American basketball coach and sportscaster. He is known for his career as a college basketball broadcaster for ESPN. Vitale was born in Passaic, New Jersey. In 2008, he was honored into the National Collegiate Basketball Hall of Fame. From 1978 until 1979, he coached the Detroit Pistons. Vitale was diagnosed with melanoma in August 2021. Two months later, he was diagnosed with lymphoma. In July 2023, he announced that he had been diagnosed with laryngeal cancer and would undergo six weeks of radiation therapy. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American sports commentators Category:College basketball coaches Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Detroit Category:People from Passaic, New Jersey
